summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含表单元格或项的列的序号。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

value.span: 一个从零开始的序号，它表示包含表单元格或项的列。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number representing the column containing the table cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 声明侦听器以跟踪表容器中表项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每个焦点更改事件都将记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取表单元格或项跨的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a table cell or item.
The number of columns spanned.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 声明侦听器以跟踪表容器中表项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每个焦点更改事件都将记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

summary.span: 获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素，该元素支持 GridPattern 控件模式，且可表示表格单元或项容器。

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.

value.span: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 元素，该元素支持 GridPattern 控件模式，且可表示表格单元或项容器。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 声明侦听器以跟踪表容器中表项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每个焦点更改事件都将记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetColumnHeaderItems() cil managed

summary.span: 检索与表项或单元格关联的全部列标题。

span.span: Retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.
A collection of column header elements.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 声明侦听器以跟踪表容器中表项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每个焦点更改事件都将记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetRowHeaderItems() cil managed

summary.span: 检索与表项或单元格关联的全部行标题。

span.span: Retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.
A collection of row header elements.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下面的示例中, 声明侦听器以跟踪表容器中表项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每个焦点更改事件都将记录项属性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event.
